testcase.name: 1_Successful_Login
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: 1 Successful login given I am on the Demo Login Page ... Status.passed in 2.204s when I fill the account information for account standardUser into the Username field and Password field ... Status.passed in 0.2988s when I click the Login Button ... Status.passed in 0.08242s then I am redirected to the Demo Main Page ... Status.passed in 0.19s then I Verify the App Logo exists ... Status.passed in 0.009037s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: 2_Failed_Login
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: 2 Failed Login given I am on the Demo Login Page ... Status.passed in 1.873s when I fill the account information for account LockedOutUser into the Username field and Password field ... Status.passed in 0.3488s when I click the Login Button ... Status.passed in 0.08879s then I Verifiy the Error Message Contains the text "Sorry, this user has been banned. " ... Status.passed in 0.1041s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: 3_Extract_Data_
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: 3 Extract Data * given I am logged in ... Status.passed in 2.311s when I am on the inventory page ... Status.passed in 0.185s then I extract content from the web page ... Status.passed in 0.008999s then Save it to a text file ... Status.passed in 0.0s then I log out ... Status.passed in 0.6714s then I verify I am on the Login page again ... Status.passed in 0.07028s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
